name: Wpit Funny Name Generator
author: Wolly

sections.description:
Jedi name:

There is a legend, George Lucas creates Jedi Name as follow:
Name: first 3 characters of the last name and first 2 characters of the name.
Last name: first 2 characters of your mother maiden last name and the first 3 characters of the city where you were born.

Ninja name:

It’s a conversion found on facebook some years ago.

Mad Max name:

I found this conversion: http://paolovalenti.info/mad-max-name-generator/

Unicorn name:

as requested by Johann van der Westhuizen.
sections.installation:
Install Wpit Funny Name Generator via the plugin directory, or upload the files manually to your server, then activate it.

Available Shortcodes:

In order to generate ninja name use [ninja_calc] shortcode, Jedi name use [jedi-calc] shortcode and Mad Max name use [madmax_calc] shortcode.
sections.faq:
Ninja name generator

In order to generate ninja name use [ninja_calc] shortcode

Jedi name generator

In order to generate Jedi name use [jedi-calc] shortcode

Mad Max name generator

In order to generate Max name use [madmax_calc] shortcode

Unicorn name generator

In order to generate Unicorn name use [unicorn_calc] shortcode

Where is the shortcodes list?

Go in backend -> Settings -> Funny Name Generator Settings

How to insert your Twitter username in sharing

Go in backend -> Settings -> Funny Name Generator Settings, then write your twitter username and press save changes

Do the plugin store data

No data will be stored.

How can I contribute?

Drop by the Wpit Funny Name Generator GitHub repository and look through the open issues and pull requests.

How can I translate this plugin in my language?

To translate in your language Wpit Funny Name
